poem.title: Tarantara (for Iain Bamforth)
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: I'm not deaf, you know. I said I amn't deaf. Sometimes I hear Sometimes I listen. Anyway Music isn't sound, it's a shape. The essence of an argument Is its tone, not its logic And certainly not that hecatomb of facts, Which carry it clearest in their flaws.
